short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to capture steps for web automation in Zoho RPA (Robotic Process Automation)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zoho RPA's web automation feature empowers you to automate tasks involving interactions with web-based applications and websites. With the browser extension installed, you can use web automation to configure a wide range of tasks, including form completion, button clicking, menu navigation, and data extraction from web pages, effectively automating your daily workflows on the web.

With this extension, you can:

     * Record your webpage interactions as workflow steps

     * Re-record specific steps within a workflow

     * Modify action types that are auto-assigned during recording


Key features of web automation in Zoho RPA:

     * Deploy workflow robots to handle repetitive and manual tasks around the clock.

     * Utilize powerful web automation to capture and streamline everyday tasks on web applications and websites.

     * Emulate a multitude of human-like interactions, such as Open URL, Click, Hover, Refresh, Scroll, Set text, Get text, Send hotkeys, Go back, Go forward, Switch to, and more.

     * Improve the accuracy of your day-to-day tasks by significantly reducing human error.

     * Streamline data extraction and reproduction with quick, almost-instantaneous actions.
